Package nusri.fyp.demo.service.img_sender.python

Class ImageSenderServiceImplOfPython

java.lang.Object
nusri.fyp.demo.service.img_sender.ImageSenderService
nusri.fyp.demo.service.img_sender.python.ImageSenderOfPython
@Service public class ImageSenderServiceImplOfPython extends ImageSenderService
Implementation of ImageSenderService for sending image frames to a backend Python server (EOID) for inference.

This class provides methods to:

  • Send frames (OpenCV Mat or Base64-encoded) synchronously for immediate inference results.
  • Send frames asynchronously via CompletableFuture for concurrent processing.
  • Interrupt and cancel ongoing processes associated with a given user.

Core logic includes:

  • Acquiring the "best" Python instance (least loaded) through PythonServerLoadBalancer.
  • Sending frames (as PNG byte arrays) via HTTP to the chosen Python instance.
  • Deserializing the JSON response into a list of ActionObservation objects.
See Also:
  • PythonServerLoadBalancer
  • ConfigService
  • ImageSenderService
  • AbstractActionObservation
  • ActionObservation

  • Field Details

    • USE_PYTHON

      public static final boolean USE_PYTHON
      Flag indicating whether the Python server should be used for inference.
      Set this to false if you want to disable Python-based inference.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

    • ImageSenderServiceImplOfPython

      public ImageSenderServiceImplOfPython(ConfigService configService, com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper objectMapper, PythonServerRepository pythonServerRepository)
      Constructs this service, initializing load balancers from entries in the PythonServerRepository.
      Each record in the repository provides a host/port, and a corresponding PythonServerLoadBalancer is created.
      Parameters:
      configService - the configuration service for retrieving necessary settings
      objectMapper - the Jackson ObjectMapper for JSON parsing
      pythonServerRepository - the repository that holds Python server info (host, port, etc.)
      See Also:
      • PythonServerRepository

    • sendFrame

      public List<ActionObservation> sendFrame(org.opencv.core.Mat frame, Map<String,String> config)
      Sends an OpenCV Mat frame synchronously to a Python server for inference.
      Converts the frame to a PNG byte array internally before sending.
      Specified by:
      sendFrame in class ImageSenderService
      Parameters:
      frame - the OpenCV Mat image frame
      config - a map containing configuration details (e.g., "host", "port")
      Returns:
      a list of ActionObservation representing the predictions from the Python server

      Sends an OpenCV Mat frame asynchronously to a Python server for inference.
      The result is returned via a CompletableFuture of AbstractActionObservation.

    • interruptSendingProcesses

      public void interruptSendingProcesses(String user)
      Cancels all running or pending CompletableFuture tasks associated with the specified user.
      Useful for stopping video processing or image processing if the user ends their session.
      Parameters:
      user - the user identifier

    • sendByteArray

      public List<ActionObservation> sendByteArray(byte[] frameBytes, PythonServerLoadBalancer balancer)
      Sends a byte array (PNG-encoded image) to the selected Python server instance and processes the response into ActionObservation objects.
      Parameters:
      frameBytes - a PNG-encoded byte array
      balancer - the PythonServerLoadBalancer to select the best instance for load balancing
      Returns:
      a list of ActionObservation returned by the Python server
      See Also:
      • PythonServerLoadBalancer.getBestInstance()
